actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the release of Abu Daoud, the alleged planner of the 1972 Munich massacre of 11 Israeli athletes, by the French Government.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the House of Representatives that the release of Abu Daoud by France was premature and unjustified, and that such release should be condemned.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the release of Abu Daoud, the alleged planner of the 1972 Munich massacre of 11 Israeli athletes, by the French Government.
